message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $95. I think it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your time and consideration, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm willing to pay a fair price, but I'm on a tight budget.
I understand you're on a budget, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $90?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price, but I'm willing to meet you at $88. Can we make it work at this price?
